title: API Gateway HTTP API to Lambda to Redshift serverless
description: API Gateway HTTP API Integration to Lambda to Redshift Serverless

introBox.headline: How it works
text: An API Gateway HTTP API is created with integration to AWS Lambda which post the query to Redshift Serverless DataAPI endpoint

A HTTP Request to API Gateway POST method will create an event to Lambda. Lamdba picks up the message uses the workgropup, dbname, query in the request body to submit the query to the Redshift serverless Data API endpoint
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
